alert.note: Alert for Montague (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued March 08 at 4:50PM CST until March 12 at 4:48AM CST by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM CST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Urban and small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of north central Texas, including the following counties, Cooke and Montague. * WHEN...Until 800 PM CST. * IMPACTS...Water over roadways. Some low-water crossings may become impassable. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. This will likely cause urban and small stream flooding. Low lying and/or poor drainage areas will experience minor flooding in the advisory area. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Bowie, St. Jo, Sunset, Lake Amon G Carter, Montague, Prairie Point, Mallard, Forestburg, Fruitland, Rosston, Stoneburg and Hood.
